text: was a Japanese movie director, animator, screenwriter and producer. Takahata was the co-founder of Studio Ghibli along with long-time collaborative partner Hayao Miyazaki. He has directed movies such as Grave of the Fireflies, Only Yesterday, Pom Poko, and the comedy My Neighbors the Yamadas. Takahata's most recent movie is The Tale of the Princess Kaguya. On April 5, 2018, Takahata died at a hospital in Tokyo of lung cancer at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Isao Takahata anime at Media Arts Database Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Japanese movie directors Category:Japanese animators Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:Japanese movie producers Category:Anime directors
